sentence.Network_en: Scantling of plates and sections will be in accordance with rules requirements and Builder's practice.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些板和部件的结构尺寸必须根据规范要求和建造者的惯例.

sentence.Network_en: Hull construction's materials & scantling designs are to be complied with the rules of Classification Society.
sentence.Network_cn: 船体结构的材料 及 构件尺寸设计应满足船级社规范要求.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (denoting prescribed size, or a set of standard dimensions): alteration of obsolete scantillon (from Old French escantillon 'sample'), by association with the suffix -ling

auth_sentence.content: The scantling of the baulks varies from twelve to fourteen inches.
